titles.title: 90-Day Review Act
90-Day Review Act
A bill to establish a 90-day limit to file a petition for judicial review of a permit, license, or approval for a highway or public transportation project, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
90-Day Review Act
This bill reduces the time limit to file a petition for judicial review of a federal permit, license, or approval for a highway or public transportation capital project. Specifically, the bill reduces the current 150-day time limit to 90 days.
